text: Tara ki dekhe na -- tadera age amara kata manaba-bansake dhbansa karechi yadera amara prthibite emanabhabe pratisthita karechilama yemana tomadera'o pratisthita kari ni? Ara amara meghamala pathiyechilama tadera upare ajasra brstipata karate, ara tadera nice diye jharanaraji prabahita hate diyechilama, tarapara tadera dhbansa karechilama tadera aparadhera jan'ya, ara tadera pare pattana karechilama an'ya eka manaba-bansera.
